sentence.Network_en: The supply of money in circulation was drastically reduced overnight.
sentence.Network_cn: 流通领域的货币供应量一夜骤减。

sentence.Network_en: As a result, services have been drastically reduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果是服务业急剧萎缩。

sentence.Network_en: Within a year the party had drastically overhauled its structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 一年内这个政党已大刀阔斧地整顿了结构.

entry.def: If you have to take drastic action in order to solve a problem, you have to do something extreme and basic to solve it.

example.ex: Drastic measures are needed to clean up the profession...
example.tran: 行业清理整顿需要严厉的措施。

example.ex: He's not going to do anything drastic about economic policy.
example.tran: 他不打算对经济政策作任何重大调整。

entry.def: A drastic change is a very great change.

example.ex: Elderly people are not in a position to make drastic changes at this stage of their life...
example.tran: 上了年纪的人在他们这个人生阶段不会再有什么实质性的改变。

example.ex: ...a drastic reduction in the numbers of people dying.

auth_sentence.content: The influence of Rupert Murdoch has been drastically curtailed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The influence of Rupert Murdoch has been drastically curtailed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The influence of Rupert Murdoch has been drastically curtailed.

auth_sentence.content: The decommissioning funds for VT Yankee are drastically insufficient.
auth_sentence.res_content: The decommissioning funds for VT Yankee are drastically insufficient.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The decommissioning funds for VT Yankee are drastically insufficient.

auth_sentence.content: Michigan has drastically scaled back its subsidies under Gov.

Sentence.sentence: It has been drastically cut by NASA.

sentences.en: Next year’s budget will have to be drastically pruned.
sentences.cn: 下一年度的预算将大幅度削减。

sentences.en: Social work services have been cut back drastically.
sentences.cn: 社会工作服务已经大大减少了。

sentences.en: We have managed to cut our costs quite drastically.
sentences.cn: 我们已设法使成本大大地降低了。

sentences.en: The strike,couple with the flood,was expected to reduce supplies of food drastically.
sentences.cn: 罢工加洪水,预计会大量减少食品供应。

sentences.en: Within a year the party had drastically overhauled its structure.
sentences.cn: 一年内这个政党已大刀阔斧地整顿了结构。
